title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Nears 200K BTC, Passing Michael Saylor's MicroStrategy
description: In less than two months of existence, the BlackRock iShares Bitcoin ETF (IBIT) has accumulated more bitcoin {{BTC}} than the largest corporate holder, MicroStrategy (MSTR).

title: Dystopian Thriller RZR Shines Bright in Los Angeles
description: Our review and interview featuring David Bianchi's Web3 cyberpunk series, which had a sneak-peek screening in L.A.

title: Robert Kiyosaki makes huge Bitcoin prediction in 2024
description: Robert Kiyosaki, the renowned author of the bestselling book “Rich Dad Poor Dad,” has once again voiced his bullish stance on Bitcoin, predicting a monumental rise in its price. According to Kiyosaki, Bitcoin is currently experiencing a surge in value, with projections indicating it could reach $300,000 per coin by the end of the year. […]

title: Elon Musk’s Connection to OpenAI Unveiled: A Bid to Salvage Tesla
description: In a recent revelation, it has come to light that Elon Musk’s involvement with OpenAI was more than just a strategic business move; it was potentially a lifeline for Tesla during a tumultuous period. The intricate web of Musk’s intentions, as revealed through emails and communications, suggests a desperate bid to rescue Tesla, intertwined with […]

title: Galaxy Digital CEO backs Bitcoin to hit $100,000 this year
description: Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz has reiterated his bullish stance on Bitcoin, confidently predicting that the cryptocurrency will surge to $100,000 by the end of the year. In a recent interview with Fox Business, Novogratz emphasized the unprecedented momentum driving Bitcoin’s price upward, fueled in part by the increasing participation of baby boomers in the […]

title: SHIB vs XRP: Will the Memecoin Flip the Embattled Token?
description:
If recent trends and predictions are correct, Ripple (XRP) could drop below Shiba Inu (SHIB) on the market cap standings. At press time SHIB was number 10 while XPR had a higher capitalization, placing it at number 6. However, XRP’s performance lately has been underwhelming when compared to that of SHIB. title: Series: “Bóc tách” mùa Halving – Giải mã Bitcoin
description:
